topic.title: Publishing Templates
topic.shortdesc: oXygen Publishing Template defines all aspects related with the look and feel(layout and styles) of the WebHelp Responsive output.

body.p: It represents the main method for customizing the output. Some possible customizations are:

ul.li: add additional template resources (CSS, JS) to customize the output
change the layout of the topic or main page by customizing which components will be displayed and their position in the page.
extend the default processing by specifying one or more XSLT extension points.
specify one or more transformation parameters.

body.p: A oXygen Publishing Template represents a customization package that you can easily share with your team. It is designed as a self-contained package stored either as a ZIP archive or as a folder on disk.
